itinerary.itinerary_description: If you don't want your gift delivered by email, you'll have the option to print instead. Then you can deliver your gift by hand or by mail and the PDF will include all the information your recipient needs to redeem it.

reviews.review_desc: CoolTrails helped me discover hidden gems right in my backyard. The trail difficulty ratings were spot on, and the user tips saved me big time!
